name: Xoho Tech, Inc
description:
Xoho tech is a premier company that offers dev ops & network services, cloud computing migration & consultancy, big data consultancy, enterprise mobile app development and web development services. 
At Xoho Tech we deliver complex yet eminent solutions on a variety of technology platforms to clients ranging from multi-national companies to dynamic startups. Our immaculate track record spans two decades and includes helping develop well over a thousand successful software projects that generated millions of dollars for our clients. By combining a broad range of technical expertise with an unparalleled commitment towards client satisfaction, we have become an confident option for businesses looking for custom software enterprise mobile app development and web development, including supplementing in-house resources in the provision of delivery of discrete project components, incorporation of the latest technology with existing enterprise infrastructure, creating complex interactive and multimedia environments.
